name: Culture Visit: Venture into Flee Market & Light Caving Experience in Kuching, Sarawak, Borneo Island
description:
We leave Kuching at 07.30 for an hour drive through the picturesque
countryside of the Sarawak river flood plain. Passing farms, fish ponds and
orchards we reach the outskirts of Bau(a former gold mining centre) and see the
extraordinary landscape of the limestone karst ahead of us. Our destination will be covering the attraction near the Bau Town. Your
Travelling Partner, a local travel and photography specialist, will brief you on the itinerary for the day and provide a
safety briefing.
